lunch.details: 1 large wrap + 170g chicken + salad + 45g hummus + feta + avocado

proteins: Eggs - 14, Chicken breast - 360g, Lean beef mince (5% fat) - 380g, Turkey mince - 190g, Salmon fillet - 190g, Bacon - 3 rashers, Greek yogurt - 180g, Whey protein - 5 scoops

fats: Avocado - 1 medium (100g), Cheese - 70g, Almonds - 25g, Peanut butter - 55g, Hummus - 60g, Feta - small amount, Sour cream - small amount, Butter - small amount, Olive oil - small bottle, Sesame oil - small bottle, Whole milk - 800ml, Honey - small jar, Protein bar (20g) - 1
